tournament.name: Fuguete Champ 264 - Play Point P/ Top 10

decks.notes: The deck focuses on using cards like Balustrade Spy and Dread Return to quickly mill through the deck and bring back key combo pieces from the graveyard, such as Lotleth Giant or Nyxborn Hydra. The mana ramp provided by cards like Overgrown Battlement and Axebane Guardian allows for explosive plays and the ability to quickly assemble the combo pieces needed to win the game. The deck also utilizes cards like Winding Way and Lead the Stampede to help dig for combo pieces and maintain card advantage throughout the game.

This deck focuses on an aggressive playstyle with a mix of creatures and spells to control the board and apply pressure on the opponent. Utilizing spells like Cast Down and Fanatical Offering alongside creatures like Krark-Clan Shaman and Gixian Infiltrator, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while maintaining a steady assault. The synergy between cards like Refurbished Familiar and Writhing Chrysalis allows for card advantage and flexibility in different situations. Additionally, the inclusion of artifact lands like Drossforge Bridge and Slagwoods Bridge adds consistency to the deck's mana base.

The main idea of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent quickly with efficient and aggressive creatures in a Mono Green Aggro strategy. The deck focuses on ramping up mana early with cards like Arbor Elf and Llanowar Elves, while utilizing cards like Nyxborn Hydra and Avenging Hunter to deal significant damage. The inclusion of Quirion Ranger and Priest of Titania also helps generate more mana to cast more threats. The deck also utilizes creatures like Masked Vandal and Spider-Man, Brooklyn Visionary for disruption and card advantage. Lead the Stampede and Winding Way provide card draw to keep the pressure on the opponent.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with fast and aggressive creatures such as Goblin Bushwhacker and Clockwork Percussionist. Utilizing cheap spells like Galvanic Blast and Lightning Bolt to remove blockers and deal direct damage, along with burn spells like Fireblast and Chain Lightning. The deck also includes cards like Wrenn's Resolve and Rally at the Hornburg to pump up your creatures and finish off the opponent quickly. Overall, the goal is to outpace and outdamage the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize.

The deck focuses on utilizing the ability of Balustrade Spy to mill cards from the library into the graveyard. By using cards like Overgrown Battlement and Wall of Roots to generate mana, the deck aims to quickly fill the graveyard with creatures. Once enough creatures are in the graveyard, the deck can utilize cards like Dread Return to bring back powerful creatures like Lotleth Giant to deal massive damage to the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Winding Way and Lead the Stampede to help find the necessary combo pieces.

This aggro deck focuses on quick and efficient creature removal and burn spells to clear the opponent's board while steadily building up your own creatures. The deck also includes artifact synergies to generate card advantage and allow for flexibility in combat situations. The mana base is designed to support the aggressive playstyle of the deck, with various lands to ensure consistent mana production. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of removal, burn, and efficient creature plays to secure a quick victory.

The main focus of this Mono Blue Aggro deck is to quickly establish a board presence with low-cost creatures like Faerie Miscreant and Spellstutter Sprite, while also utilizing evasive threats like Ninja of the Deep Hours. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan with counterspells and tempo plays, while also generating card advantage through cards like Of One Mind. The inclusion of Moon-Circuit Hacker and Smoke Shroud allows for some additional versatility and protection for key creatures. The overall strategy is to pressure the opponent early and maintain control of the game.

This aggressive Rakdos deck focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with low-cost creatures and burn spells. By efficiently using cards like Lightning Bolt and Fiery Temper to remove threats and dealing direct damage, the deck aims to maintain control of the board while steadily chipping away at the opponent's life total. Additionally, the deck utilizes cards like Faithless Looting to maintain card advantage and ensure a steady stream of threats. With a solid mana base and a blend of creature and burn spells, this aggressive deck aims to close out games quickly before the opponent has a chance to stabilize.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly deploy a board presence and overwhelm the opponent with cheap artifacts, utilizing cards like Cast Down, Thoughtcast, and Refurbished Familiar to maintain card advantage and sustain momentum. By efficiently deploying threats such as Myr Enforcer and Glint Hawk, while also utilizing cards like Blood Fountain and Tithing Blade to gain incremental advantages, this deck aims to put pressure on the opponent and quickly close out the game with its aggressive affinity strategy.

The focus of this deck is to quickly assemble a powerful creature with multiple auras attached to it, creating a massive threat that is hard for opponents to deal with. By utilizing hexproof creatures like Slippery Bogle and Silhana Ledgewalker, the deck aims to protect its investment in auras while attacking aggressively. The auras in the deck provide both offense and defense, boosting the creature's power and toughness while also granting it additional abilities like lifelink and protection. This deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a fast, hard-hitting creature that is difficult to stop.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly mill your own library using Balustrade Spy, then return all your creatures from the graveyard to the battlefield with Dread Return. This allows you to overwhelm your opponent with a large number of creatures in a single turn. The deck also includes mana ramp creatures like Overgrown Battlement and Axebane Guardian to help cast your spells faster. The goal is to create a powerful combo that can win the game in just a few turns.

The main idea of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures like Voldaren Epicure and Sneaky Snacker, while also dealing direct damage with cards like Lightning Bolt and Fireblast. The goal is to quickly reduce the opponent's life total to zero by combining creature damage with burn spells like Lava Dart and Fiery Temper. Cards like Grab the Prize and Highway Robbery help to maintain card advantage and keep the pressure on the opponent. Ultimately, this deck aims to win the game as quickly as possible through a combination of creature-based aggression and direct damage spells.

The main focus of this Mono Black Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with efficient creature removal and small, aggressive creatures. With a mix of creatures that have disruptive abilities and ways to drain the opponent's life total, the deck aims to control the board while steadily chipping away at the opponent's life total. The inclusion of spell removal and card draw helps to maintain momentum and keep the pressure on the opponent. Additionally, the land base is focused on producing black mana consistently to ensure the deck can cast its spells effectively.

The main idea of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy using low-cost creatures like Faeries and Ninjas, as well as countermagic to protect our threats. The deck aims to control the board early on using cheap counterspells and disruptive creatures, while also drawing cards efficiently to maintain card advantage. By combining evasive creatures with disruption spells, the Mono Blue Aggro deck can quickly close out games before the opponent has a chance to stabilize.

This deck focuses on fast-paced, aggressive gameplay utilizing low-cost creatures and burn spells to quickly reduce the opponent's life total. The synergy between cards like Lightning Bolt and Fiery Temper allows for efficient removal of threats while dealing damage to the opponent. Additionally, the inclusion of lifelink and drain effects such as Vampire's Kiss and Alms of the Vein helps to sustain the player's own life total. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of creature pressure and direct damage, racing to victory before the opponent can stabilize.

This UR Control deck focuses on utilizing card draw and counterspells to control the game, while also having removal and creatures as win conditions. The deck includes a mix of cantrips like Ponder and Brainstorm, along with powerful creatures like Murmuring Mystic and Tolarian Terror. Counterspell helps to control the opponent's plays, while Skred and Lightning Bolt handle threats. The deck also includes some pirate-themed cards like Crimson Fleet Commodore for flavor. Overall, the strategy revolves around outlasting opponents and eventually overwhelming them with powerful spells and creatures.
